an2.11:2.2: yamidaṁ → yadidaṁ (si, sya-all) | sekhānametaṁ → sekhametaṁ (bj, sya-all, km); sekhānaṁ etaṁ (pts1ed)
an2.15:1.2: na phāsuṁ → na phāsukaṁ (bj); na phāsu (mr) | viharissantī’ti → viharissanti (bj, sya-all, km, mr)
an2.15:2.4: Maṁ so → tasmā maṁ so (sya-all); taṁ maṁ so (pts1ed)
an2.19:1.3: cedaṁ → no ce taṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
